column1: Visitation Tuesday 2pm to 8pm with a 4:30pm Prayer Service and a 7pm Elks Service at the O'Brien Sullivan Funeral Home
column3: Novi (248) 348-1800.Instate Wednesday 10am until 11am Funeral Service at St John's Armenian Church 22001 Northwestern Highway
column4: Southfield (248) 569-3405.     S. Army Military Honors Service to be performed outside of the Church following the funeral.  Interment Woodlawn Cemetery.
